short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pinpoint the website and we'll deliver instant structured data reports on hi-tech companies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate instant technology reports on high-tech companies and support your primary tasks: to sell, connect, hire or lead in technology.

Scouting companies better and faster:
✅ Choose a company you want to inspect, and open its website.
✅ Launch the browser extension and click on the CHECK COMPANY button to initiate a scan. 
✅ We will return a direct link to the company report on our Data platform. 

Just in case your company is not on the platform yet, we will generate the report in no more than 24 hours. You can request to be notified via e-mail or check back at a later time.

Getting started:	
1️⃣ Install and launch the extension.
2️⃣ Create a free Technote account simply by entering your e-mail and creating a password. 
No credit card required.
3️⃣ That's it! You can start browsing company websites and generating in-depth reports.

Use the extension to gain insights on areas such as:
🔎 Competitive landscape: discover companies with highly similar technology to the ones you are inspecting.
🔎 Intellectual property: find out who owns high value patents and/or trademarked products with the latest technology.
🔎 Collaborations and networks: see who works with whom behind the company you are inspecting.
🔎 Research talent from academia: find the researchers that have been working on similar technologies to the company you have identified.

📊 For your convenience, your history is easily accessible via your own private Company List. 

Technote provides structured data in one place from frequently used sources:
🖥 Company websites
📄 Trademarks
🔬 Patents
📖 Publications
📢 Social media. 

Our team is continuously working on improving the data quality and making Technote the go-to tool for technology scouts, innovation managers, business developers, and beyond.

⭐️ If you find the extension useful, we would appreciate your review! 
✉️ For any questions or feedback, please do not hesitate to get in touch with our team via e-mail: info@technote.ai.
